name: Clearway
description:
Clearway

You rev your engine, you're raring to go, the goal is your prey, it's just you and the ball, [insert more racing and/or football stereotypes here], because this is football... wait for it... with CARS!

An early prototype of my first original game idea.

  • Top-down 2D action!
  • Local multiplayer fun!*
  • A variety of vehicles to choose from!*
  • Controller-Support*

*Planned Additional Features
